CPTTheme Class Reference

Creates a CPTGraph instance formatted with predefined themes. More...

Properties

Class graphClass
 The class used to create new graphs. Must be a subclass of CPTGraph.

Detailed Description

Creates a CPTGraph instance formatted with predefined themes.

CPTTheme * CPTTheme::themeNamed: ( NSString *  themeName) [static, virtual]

Gets a named theme.

Parameters:
themeNameThe name of the desired theme.
Returns:
A CPTTheme instance with name matching themeName or nil if no themes with a matching name were found.
